long_description: The warm, compressible kids' Marmot Mavericks 40 Sleeping Bag is a smart choice to pack along for comfortable summer sleeping at the cabin or backcountry campsite. Synthetic SpiraFil high loft insulation and Wave construction work together to keep your child comfortable all night; rated for warmth down to about 40degF. Unique blend of 3-denier, conjugated spiral hollow fibers and 1-denier polyester fibers provides loft, warmth and compressibility. Tough polyester shell is protected with a durable water repellent finish. 2-way, dual side zippers (1 full-zip that extends around footbox, 1 partial-zip) allow top of bag to fold back, allowing easy entry for kids. Zipper guard runs the entire length of the draft tube to prevent fabric from getting caught in zipper. Brushed lining in chest and footbox for added warmth and comfort. No more midnight drawcord fumbling-smooth, flat upper cord and hard, round lower cord make top opening adjustments easy. Bag can be unzipped and opened flat to create a blanket. Marmot Mavericks 40 Sleeping Bag includes compression stuff sack.
